2002 Soccer World Cup - Group D, First Round

National teams, games, goals and standings from Group D of the first round stage played in the 2002 FIFA World Cup, including details of points, games won and lost and goals scored and received.

Group D, National Teams


Poland
Portugal
South Korea
USA

Group D, Standings

Standing National Team PTS GP W D L GS GA GD Qualified
1. South Korea 7 3 2 1 0 4 1 3 Yes
2. USA 4 3 1 1 1 5 6 -1 Yes
3. Portugal 3 3 1 0 2 6 4 2 No
4. Poland 3 3 1 0 2 3 7 -4 No

Group D, Games Played

Game Date Results
1. Jun 04, 2002 South Korea 2 - 0 Poland
    Sun Hong Hwang - 26'
    Sang Chul Yoo - 53'
2. Jun 05, 2002 USA 3 - 2 Portugal
    John O'Brien - 4'
    Jorge Costa (own goal) - 29'
    Brian Mcbride - 36'
    39' - Beto
    71' - Jeff Agoos (own goal)
3. Jun 10, 2002 South Korea 1 - 1 USA
    24' - Clint Mathis
    Jung Hwan Ahn - 78'
4. Jun 10, 2002 Portugal 4 - 0 Poland
    Pauleta - 14'
    Pauleta - 65'
    Pauleta - 77'
    Rui Costa - 88'
5. Jun 14, 2002 Poland 3 - 1 USA
    Emmanuel Olisadebe - 3'
    Pawel Kryszalowicz - 5'
    Marcin Zewlakow - 66'
    83' - Landon Donovan
6. Jun 14, 2002 Portugal 0 - 1 South Korea
    70' - Ji Sung Park

Abbreviations:
PTS = Points / GP = Games played / W = Wins / D = Draws / L = Losses
GF = Goals For / GA = Goals against / GD = Goal Difference

Note: until the 1990 World Cup each win was worth 2 points, after that each win is worth 3 points.
